Product Showcase Section.Layout: Grid layout with multiple columns, adjusting based on screen size (2 columns on small screens, up to 4 columns on extra-large screens).
Product Showcase Section.Design: Clean and modern, emphasizing high-quality product images with subtle hover effects to enhance interactivity.

Key Elements.Header: Includes a bold section title (Collections) with a supplementary 'Show more' button for additional navigation.
Key Elements.Product Cards: Each card displays an image, category, and product name. The images have a hover effect that zooms in slightly for a dynamic feel.
Key Elements.Call-to-Action Button: A prominent button at the top right for displaying more products.

Product Showcase Section.Use Cases: Ideal for e-commerce platforms, online fashion stores, or any website needing to highlight multiple products or categories prominently.
